alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:21AM CDT until June 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR ASHLEY COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN ARKANSAS AND NORTHERN MOREHOUSE PARISHES... At 320 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of North Crossett, or 8 miles northwest of Crossett, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... North Crossett around 325 AM CDT. Old Milo around 330 AM CDT. Hamburg around 335 AM CDT. Snyder around 345 AM CDT. Portland, Montrose and Parkdale around 355 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
